caption.title: Core–shell structure of the CCNEs.
caption.p: s.e.m. ( a) and TEM ( b) micrographs of the CCNE after 30 min deposition. TEM micrographs of the CCNEs after 20 min ( c) and 40 min ( d) deposition. STEM image ( e) and EDX elemental mapping ( f) of the core–shell nanocable. High-resolution TEM images ( g– i) of the nanoscale after 5 min deposition, and corresponding micro-mechanism models ( j). Scale bar in a, 1 um; scale bars in b– f, 200 nm; scale bar in g, 40 nm; scale bars in h and i, 5 nm.
